ygData.subject: Re: Interview with Geoffrey Zatkin
ygData.msgSnippet: They have done so well in this game at keeping it balanced that as long as they say the stunned thing was done on purpose and not just a bug I can let it go.
ygData.messageBody:
They have done so well in this game at keeping it balanced that as long as
they say the stunned thing was done on purpose and not just a bug I can let
it go.

It's killed me though and that's always disappointing, and can even lead to
many explitives.

I guess I think the game balance is good, and while my self interest wants
my character to be more powerful, I can understand if the balance bean
counters think it is correct.

Hey, do any of you Bind Wound? At 255 you should be able to heal 63 or 64
points with one bandage. How does that compare with meditation and healing
spells? Maybe not for combat but for post combat recovery?
-aj

----- Original Message -----
From: FlashD <DunleyG@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, September 03, 1999 11:28 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Interview with Geoffrey Zatkin


> From: "FlashD" <DunleyG@...>
>
> Well Looks Like The Cleric Petition was answered, with a big "NO". Any
> opinions ?
